title: FT: Tinker portrait + 28 Raw, w. SL, OM, Sov., EPDG, Coupon
author: dougscats

posts.post_title: FT: Tinker portrait + 28 Raw, w. SL, OM, Sov., EPDG, Coupon
posts.post_content:
I much prefer trades.  So I’m not setting prices.  
But if you want to make an offer, I’ll consider it; thanks.

Trade-wise, I collect all different backs, focusing on off-backs, and I'm always looking to upgrade my basic 518, particularly hall-of-famers.  I prefer ungraded cards, though I'll trade for graded too.

Post on this thread or PM me, and I'll send you my email address.  
First come, first served.  

Ungraded: Grades are my opinion.

First Four:
TINKER portrait, Poor [paper-loss on back; front presents well, but note very light pencil? mark on top, easy to miss],
Hinchman, EPDG, G-VG.
Hart, SL, Piedmont, G-VG [Howe McCormick stamp on back],
Tannehill, Sovereign 460, G+.

Page 1 Note on scans: As the page turns, the backs are in reverse order:
Elberfeld, SC460/25, G+,
Donlin batting, SC 350/30, Fair, 
McQuillan, SC350/30,
Young, Minn., SC 350/30, F-G,
Ewing, SC 150 OP/49, Fair +
McCormick, SC 350/30, G-VG

Page 2 Note again: As the page turns, the backs are in reverse order:
Dessau, Piedmont, Poor,
Murphy batting SC 460/25, G-VG, [?looks slightly short, but does not look trimmed to me],
Bell, follow through, SC 460/25, Poor [front, F-G, back has pencil mark].
Schreck, Piedmont, F-G
Barry, Piedmont, Fair.
Batch, Sovereign 350/25, Fair.
Dooin, Piedmont, Fair [Howe McCormick stamp on back],
Leifield, Piedmont, Poor.

Page 3 Again: As the page turns, the backs are in reverse order:
Criss, Old Mill, Poor [broken corner, fountain pen blotter back, presentable front],
Doolan, Old Mill, Poor,
Revelle, Old Mill, Poor, 
Rockenfeld,Old Mill, Poor,
Ball, Clev, hands at chest, SC 460/25, Poor,
Stone, SC 150/30, Poor, paper-loss on back.
Needham, Coupon, looks like it was trimmed with a scissors.
Bay, Piedmont 350/25 [SL], clipped/trimmed corners, no apparent creases. 

Three More:
Jackson, Piedmont, G-VG,
Bradley, Sovereign 350, G/Mk--Small x in middle of back,
Adkins, Piedmont , G+

Chance scan.--Chance TRADED--No longer available.

Previous transactions on this thread:

Update.  Several sold, still working on trades.

Thanks for the good trade, Billy,
and for the big trade, Bob.
Which OMSL do you have left?

Only OMSL left is Revelle.

Murray and Crandall sold; thanks Mike.

posts.post_title: Update with new addition, 4-punched Mordecai Brown
posts.post_content: Thanks Billy, Chris, Bob, and Anthony.

[quote name="dougscats" post=2414159]Chance scan.--Chance TRADED--No longer available.[/QUOTE]

What do u think an 8 or 9 grade would bring with that frank chance?
Thanks for the sale and trade Chris and Luke.

New scans!
With some interesting new additions.
what are you looking for in trade?

Sorry, I must have edited my trade wants by mistake.
I’m mostly looking for upgrades on just about everything, particularly hall of farmers, and off-backs in general.
